::Feline:;

She rested her head on his shoulder as they walked along. "I'm 
Feline. It's so wonderful to meet you Chordate."  She purred lightly 
and held his arm snuggly in her arms.  She gave a dreamy sigh and 
walked with him.  

As they were walking, she was mapping the layout of the ship in her 
memory banks for later on.  

She spoke softly to him."I was lucky to have made here.  I was even 
luckier to have found such friends like you here." She leaned up and 
kisses him on the cheek. "Thank you." She rested her head back on his 
shoulder.  She was smiling, not only for him, but she was very 
pleased with how well things were working out so far.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Chordate:
> 
> 
> 
> Chordate sighed in a happy tone.  Feline was still brushing the tip 
of her 
> tail against his neck.  It felt nice.  Listening to what she had to 
say, he 
> smiled back.  "You're welcome." he responded.  That was all he 
could get out, 
> now that Feline had began holding onto his arm tightly and was now 
closer 
> than before.  He sighed happily once more, continuing to walk for 
the mess 
> hall, wishing the moment would last forever.  But, he knew, as soon 
as the 
> computer told him the intruder was on the move, he would have to 
> unfortunately go.  "Oh, heh, how silly of me.  My name is 
Chordate.  What's 
> yours?"
